channel.title: Layout on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Layout on SoftLayer API

item.title: createObject
item.description:
REST Example 

curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [SoftLayer_Layout_Profile]}' \
'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Layout_Profile/createObject'
